pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Inference of QTL Networks // Functions to Simultaneously Infer Causal Graphs and Genetic Architecture. Includes acyclic and cyclic graphs for data from an experimental cross with a modest number (10) of phenotypes driven by a few genetic loci (QTL). Chaibub Neto E, Keller MP, Attie AD, Yandell BS (2010) Causal Graphical Models in Systems Genetics: a unified framework for joint inference of causal network and genetic architecture for correlated phenotypes. Annals of Applied Statistics 4: 320-339. doi:10.1214/09-AOAS288.
